thread.title: Flashbay reviewed by Dr Elizabeth Mati - Pasifikology Exec
thread.title_full: Flashbay reviewed by Dr Elizabeth Mati - Pasifikology Exec

author: Dr Elizabeth Mati - Pasifikology Exec
title: Flashbay reviewed by Dr Elizabeth Mati - Pasifikology Exec
text: Thank you Christian Beaumont and Flashbay team for the excellent customer service and the timely delivery of a high quality we are highly satisfied with. Appreciate the patience and being presented with multiple proofs of product before deciding. Would not hesitate to recommend Flashbay team to others and will definitely use service again in future if we require further USBs. Thank you
